pages.text: Brought into life by the spilling of Ymirs lifeblood, the dwarves have a strong binding with the earth, fire and the mountains. This makes them excellent and skilled metalworkers and craftsmen, and they take great pride in this.

pages.title: Summoning Contract
pages.text: Most dwarves can be found underground mining and some have build a home, somewhere in the Feywild. If you trade alot with them, they may offer you a Summoning Contract.
